rooms.name: Outside the City Walls
rooms.description: The stout walls of the City of Midgaard are to the south.  The wall here has been carefully constructed to hide a door into the back of the temple.  A plain covered in tall grass is to the north.  The blowing wind ripples the tall grass in a peaceful manner.

rooms.name: It is 11 o'clock pm, on the Day of the Bull.
rooms.description: The light intensity here is: 4 Tick Counter:  13476 ticks since the last reboot Tick Timer:       32 seconds until the next tick

rooms.name: Grasslands near the walls of Midgaard
rooms.description: The grasslands surround you on all sides.  Tall grasses of all kinds are growing.  Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, east, and south.

Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, east, and south.

Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, east, south, and west.
npcs: An Astyll Ranger is here patrolling the grasslands.

rooms.name: A path leading towards the forest
rooms.description: You are on a path through the tall grass.  It leads towards a large forest in the west, and towards the grasslands in the east.

Grasses with green and yellow varigated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the east and south.  To the north is a range of hills.

rooms.name: A dimly lit path
rooms.description: You tread on a narrow path between two hills.  To the north you can hear the faint sounds of a village.  To the south the land is covered in tall grass.

rooms.name: A dimly lit path
rooms.description: You tread through the hills on a dimly lit path.  To the north you can hear the faint sounds of a village.  Far to the south are the grasslands of the Astyll Hills.

rooms.name: A dimly lit path
rooms.description: You tread through the hills on a dimly lit path.  The hills begin to thin out here.  Northward you see the faint outline of a village.

Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, west, and south.

Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continues in all directions.

rooms.name: South end of the Grasslands
rooms.description: The grasslands surround you on all sides.  Tall grasses of all kinds are growing.  Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, and west.
npcs: An Astyll Ranger is here patrolling the grasslands.

rooms.name: A path through the tall grass
rooms.description: You are on a path that has been trambled and cut through the tall grass.  It leads east towards the base of tall cliff.  Towards the west are vast acres of tall grasslands.

rooms.name: A path through the tall grass
rooms.description: You are on an path running east-west through the grasslands.  The grass here has been cut and trampled to make passage easy.  You are nearing the base of a tall cliff towards the east.

rooms.name: At the base of a tall cliff
rooms.description: You are at a base of a tall cliff.  The grasslands are back to the west. The cliff continues to both the north and south.  To the south is a well constructed cabin.  Directly to the east You see what looks like an entrance to a small cave.

rooms.name: An entrance to a damp cave
rooms.description: The floor of the cave entrance appears to be covered in a hard, wet mud that does not cling to your feet.  Using your senses to scan around the area yields a couple interesting observations.  There appears to be footprints or tracks upon the floor, although you could not tell which they are without examining them further.  To the east the cave continues downward, and you can make out the faint smell of bat guano.

rooms.name: At the top of a deep shaft
rooms.description: Standing atop a deep shaft in the dark cave, you peer down into the hole and can make out the bottom about twenty feet below you.  Fortunately for you, a ladder has been placed here by some wise adventurer and it appears to be sturdy enough to handle the weight of a half-giant if needed.  Who knows what awaits you down there?  Perhaps you will find a long lost treasure trove, or maybe there will be a horde of goblins waiting to jump out of the shadows and end your adventures right there.  Just west of here you can see the entrance to the cave winding its way out towards the Astyll Hills.

rooms.name: At the bottom of a deep shaft
rooms.description: The bottom of the shaft opens up a world hidden from the eyes of all but the most brave of adventurers.  Stalagmites and stalactites meet one another in a crescendo of beauty that many fearful city inhabitants will never get to see. A well trodden path winds its way south through the cave, as though some creature or creatures have inhabited this cave at some point.  Perhaps they still dwell here, or perhaps this path is the last remaining evidence of a people long gone from an age that came and went.  A sturdy wooden ladder reaches down from above you, offering a way out of the cave should you choose to take it.

rooms.name: A path through the cave
rooms.description: You find yourself on a narrow path through the nearly innumerable number of stalagmites and stalactites that blanket the floor and ceiling of the cave.  An eerie silence, void of the crickets, birds, and various animals from the surface world comforts you by allowing you to hear any potential movement within the cave.  From time to time you hear the fluttering of wings above you, but it is too dark to make out any discernible figures.  The path forks in a three-way intersection.  Directly north of here, a deep shaft can be seen overhead.  The path continues to snake along to the east and west.
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: A path through the cave
rooms.description: A hardened dirt floor beneath your feet has been smoothed to a slick sheen over the years, likely from water flowing and draining in a constant ebb-and-flow process.  The exit out of the cave is west of here, while continuing to the east will lead you deeper into an unknown adventure.

rooms.name: At a long passageway
rooms.description: You have arrived at a narrow corridor within the cave, providing unhindered and relatively easy passage to the south.  The floor dips slightly, but the ease of travel makes for safe travels to and from the south.
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: A long passageway
rooms.description: Straight with little to no danger from the surrounding walls, stalagmites, and stalactites, this passageway offers safe passage through this portion of the cave.

rooms.name: A winding path
rooms.description: You find yourself on a narrow path through the nearly innumerable number of stalagmites and stalactites that blanket the floor and ceiling of the cave.  An eerie silence, void of the crickets, birds, and various animals from the surface world comforts you by allowing you to hear any potential movement within the cave.  From time to time you hear the fluttering of wings above you, but it is too dark to make out any discernible figures.  A narrow passage may be seen to the west.  Off to the north a long corridor catches your eye.
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: A narrow passage in the cave
rooms.description: The narrow cave path snakes along, weaving through the various mineral deposits that have seeped through the rocky ceiling above you over the ages. Piles of a milky-white substance litter the area all around you, inviting you to inspect them for clues about what may or may not live in the cave.  The only
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: A turn in the cave
rooms.description: The twisting passage turns slightly here, bobbing and weaving its way through the cave.  The limestone walls are smooth and show evidence of erosion throughout the ages.  Steady, horizontal striations of gradually darkening lines indicate that water once sat for long periods of time in this chamber.  The tunnel opens up to a cavernous chamber further along the path to the west. North of here the path narrows as it twists and winds it way through the cave system.

rooms.name: An open cavern
rooms.description: A wide, open cavern splits in three directions here.  Off to the north a cramped tunnel extends onwards towards an unknown destination.  Rocks and boulders are strewn about to the east, clearly an indicator that the ceiling has collapsed and settled safely upon the cave floor.  While moving east does not present any immediate danger from the cave surroundings, off to the west the cavern extends itself and pools of crystal clear water can be seen.
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: A spacious cavern
rooms.description: Fluttering wings can be heard all around you accompanied by the random, yet constant sound of animals chirping in the darkness above.  Crystal clear water gather along the edges of the path, forming a series of underground pools that are teaming with life in this delicate habitat.  Far in the distance to the east, the cavern widens and there appears to be an intersection that provides different ways in which you can travel.  Just to the west of here the cavern walls begin to press in upon themselves as it narrows.

rooms.name: A widening path in the cave
rooms.description: Strangely devoid of the stalagmites and stalactites that have become all too familiar, this portion of the cave begins to widen.  To the north you can make out a narrow, cramped tunnel filled with mud, while to the east the sound of your footsteps grows more distant.

rooms.name: A tunnel through the cave wall
rooms.description: The narrow tunnel squeezes you on all sides, leaving you muddy as you move through the passage that weaves through the cave walls.  It is too difficult to tell what is beyond here.

rooms.name: A winding path through the cave
rooms.description: The narrow cave path snakes along, weaving through the various mineral deposits that have seeped through the rocky ceiling above you over the ages. Piles of a milky-white substance litter the area all around you, inviting you to inspect them for clues about what may or may not live in the cave.  The path continues to the north, while a small hole can be seen in the cave wall to the west.

rooms.name: A winding path through the cave
rooms.description: You find yourself on a narrow path through the nearly innumerable number of stalagmites and stalactites that blanket the floor and ceiling of the cave.  An eerie silence, void of the crickets, birds, and various animals from the surface world comforts you by allowing you to hear any potential movement within the cave.  From time to time you hear the fluttering of wings above you, but it is too dark to make out any discernible figures.  The shaft leading out of the cave lies to the east.  To the south of you the winding path continues into the darkened cave system.
items: A small blob of bat ichor

rooms.name: Just south of the shallow shaft
rooms.description: Tapering off into a narrow funnel, the cavern once again begins to squeeze and press you from all sides as the walls grow closer together.  Off to the south the cavern opens up, while towards the north you can see the cavern slope downwards into a deep hole with a sturdy ladder reaching down into it.

rooms.name: Standing above a shallow shaft
rooms.description: The shaft continues downwards, further into the heart of the dark cave system.  Carved by water flowing over the rocky cave structure over time, it is obvious to you that this is the lowest point of the first section of the cave. As such, it makes sense that although the floor is currently bone dry, water should find its way here to slowly drain during the Midgaard rainy season.  An oak ladder leads down into the shaft, though with a good leap you might land safely below.

rooms.name: At the bottom of the shallow shaft
rooms.description: Mud encrusted walls surround you on all sides.  The only direction out of here are the shaft ascending upwards towards the cavern above, and a dark, narrow hole leading to the north.

rooms.name: A narrow hole in the cave wall
rooms.description: Gradual dips and drops in the cave floor have allowed pools of water to collect in various spots.  A thick, silty mud covers the surface of the floor, causing you to consider your safety as you duck beneath the rocky ceiling above you.  Off to the south is the shaft leading towards the cavernous area of the cave.  Just to the north you can make out the end of the short tunnel.

rooms.name: The muddy cave passage
rooms.description: Twisting and winding through the earth, the cave system bends and changes directions at random intervals.  A product of the natural, eroding power of water, you imagine that anything might be lurking down here in the water-carved corridors.
items: A large bat wing sits on the ground

rooms.name: A muddy intersection
rooms.description: The passageway diverges in all directions, leading to unknown destinations throughout the cave system.  Off to the north and east you cannot discern any noticeable difference between the direction of the shaft towards the south. Far away in the distance to the west you can hear a faint rumbling, the sound of rapidly moving water deep within the cave.

rooms.name: A muddy corridor
rooms.description: Crammed between the cave walls to your right and left, the narrow corridor presses you in from all side.  An intersection lies just to the south, and to the north you see a sharp turn in the darkness.

rooms.name: A sharp turn
rooms.description: Two directions present themselves to you: Far to the south a four-way intersection presents itself to you, enticing you to approach it and explore the different paths within the cave.  West of here the cave continues you and you think that you can see what appears to be another turn leading to the north.

rooms.name: Turning Point
rooms.description: From here you can either turn around and head for safety, or continue further into the depths of the unknown.  From time to time you believe you hear a deep growl coming from far below you in another level, but you cannot be sure.

rooms.name: Narrow Straights
rooms.description: Water has gathered here in a deep hollow that requires you to tread across the narrow straight leading to the north and south.  As you tread water you wonder what may be lurking beneath you, waiting to drag you down towards a watery grave.  The only thought entering your mind right now is getting across as quickly as possible.

rooms.name: A turn in the cave
rooms.description: Calcium deposits dot the ground beneath your feat, drippings from the ceiling that have settled here over the ages.  Unlike other areas of this cave, the dirt here is bone dry, almost chalky as though water had never touched it since the dawn of creation.  To the south a pool of water springs up from nowhere, but to the east the dusty ground continues.

rooms.name: The dusty corridor
rooms.description: Bats swoop you from time to time as you venture deeper into the cave.  There is an eerie and yet peaceful silence to this corridor, the only sound you hear being the crunching of insects as you walk, and the steady beat of your heart. There appears to be some sort of tracks on the ground to your immediate right.

rooms.name: The dusty corridor
rooms.description: Each step you take leaves clearly marked imprints upon the ground, and judging by the looks of it, you are not alone.  It would appear that several large creatures have found their way into the cave, or so the footprints would indicate.  They could be old, or perhaps they are fresh.  There's no telling what lurks around here, but the footprints do veer off towards the south into what looks like a tight-fitting burrow of some sort.

rooms.name: The tight burrow
rooms.description: You find it difficult to move, let alone turn around, although you are just able to manage it if you contort your body into an awkward position.  The barrow slopes sharply leading down into a dark chamber of some sort, footprints of several creatures to boot.  Whatever animal has made this their home is likely not going to appreciate visitors.

rooms.name: A barren passage
rooms.description: This non-descript passage seems free of any debris, bat guano, mineral deposits, or anything else that would indicate it is or has been used for anything other than as a passageway.  Other than the cave structure itself, the only sign of any unnatural use of this area are some animal footprints leading towards the north.

rooms.name: A barren passage
rooms.description: Up ahead to the north you spot what looks like a turn in the passageway, while off to the south is the exit to this section of the cave.  The musty, dank air smells stagnant an pungent to your nose.  What is that smell?  It smells awful!

rooms.name: The narrow turn
rooms.description: Turning sideways allows you mobility in either an eastern or southern direction, but not without difficulty.  There only appears to be room enough for a single person to pass through the tunnel at a time, but thankfully the rocky walls surrounding you give no indication of instability.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Den
rooms.description: Bones from various animals and creatures are strewn about the cave floor. Tattered and ragged clothes can be seen everywhere, some mingled with large piles of dung while others lay upon the floor in random places.  Whatever creature has made this den their home is surely carnivorous, and you would hate to find yourself winding up being eaten by it.  An overwhelming odor from the various dropping lingers in the air, a rank and apparent indicator that the creature which has made this their home frequents this place regularly.

rooms.name: The Den of the Bear
rooms.description: As you enter the den you are immediately struck by the familiar smell of death.  Unlike other parts of the cave, the ground here is relatively dry and the steady temperature of the air around you is cool.  As you search around the cave you stumble upon a long, white bone and notice a familiar site.  The noticeably recognizable equipment of numerous Astyll Rangers litters the floor, their skeletons strewn about randomly.
npcs: The cave bear is here sleeping.

rooms.name: A turn in the dusty corridor
rooms.description: The corridor leads off towards the west where the dry air of the cave seems noticeably different than other areas you have seen in here.  Something about the area immediately south of here gives you a strange feeling.  Are your eyes playing tricks on you, or is it unnaturally dark?  The shadows cast by your light source seem to be lighter than the actual darkness of the cave.  Odd indeed!
items: A large bat wing sits on the ground

rooms.name: An unnatural darkness
rooms.description: Light seems to be absorbed by some powerful magic or energy that is difficult to discern.  This darkness seems to emanate from the rocky walls themselves, accompanied by a faint humming sound.  Whatever is causing this must surely be a natural, magical formation of the cave structure, but this does not mean that powerful enemies have not taken hold of this situation and embedded themselves somewhere close.
npcs: Mangy the Undead Master is here standing. (cloaked) (invisible)

rooms.name: A dark alcove
rooms.description: Darkness touches every part of your body, thick to the touch and bringing with it a certain heaviness upon your mind.  You can make out flames flickering on the walls in what must surely be lit torches, but they seem so distant and yet they are so close.

rooms.name: A muddy corridor
rooms.description: Not unlike the other parts of the cave, this corridor is caked with a silty, hard and yet damp layer of mud.  The smell of bat guano is overwhelmingly strong, stinging your nose with every breath.

rooms.name: A turn in the cave
rooms.description: A sharp turn in the muddy corridor leaves you wondering which direction you are heading.  You are quickly beginning to realize that there are very few distinct differences throughout the cave other than the sound of water flowing from the west.

rooms.name: A graduated change
rooms.description: Swiftly moving water can be heard to the west where the corridor begins to slope upwards.  Rocky ground mixes with dirt and silt, and it would seem that the water has failed to lay sediment here, finding a path of lesser resistance elsewhere.  Off to the east an intersection diverges in all directions.
items: A large bat wing sits on the ground

rooms.name: A turn in the cave
rooms.description: Your footing is sure here, the ground hardening as it slopes slightly upwards towards the north.  While mud has become an ever familiar and yet cumbersome obstacle during your journey in the cave, you find yourself considering why limestone is now beneath your feet.  What lays ahead to the north, and should this sign of change consider you to turn back within the cave?

rooms.name: Standing at the edge of a deep crevasse
rooms.description: sound of swiftly flowing water in the darkness below to the west, but you are unable to discern just how deep it may be.  The only thing that is clear about going west is that if you continue, there is likely no chance of surviving the deadly fall that would surely lead to a watery grave beneath the Astyll Hills. Moving south, back in the direction you came is the safest bet at this point!

rooms.name: Falling into the abyss
rooms.description: As you move closer to the edge your foot slips and you find yourself plummeting downward into the underground crevasse.  After what seems like an eternity you count your blessings as you hear the sound of running water.  For a moment you think you may actually survive the fall... . . . . . . . . Down and down you go... To your death.

rooms.name: It is 3 o'clock am, on the Day of Thunder.
rooms.description: The light intensity here is: 6 Tick Counter:  13504 ticks since the last reboot Tick Timer:       48 seconds until the next tick

rooms.name: North end of the grasslands
rooms.description: You are at the northern end of the grasslands.  Tall grasses of all kinds are growing.  Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  A small path cuts through the hills to the north.  The grasslands continue to the west and south.

rooms.name: Surrounded by grasslands
rooms.description: The grasslands surround you on all sides.  Tall grasses of all kinds are growing.  Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  A path through the grasslands leads to the east towards the Hills of Astyll.  The grasslands continue to the east and west.
npcs: An Astyll Ranger is here patrolling the grasslands.

rooms.name: Towards the edge of the grasslands
rooms.description: The grasses are beginning to grow smaller here as the land shows signs of becoming hillier.  The grasslands scintillate in their full glory to the west.  Far to the east you can see large mountains.
npcs: An Astyll Ranger is here patrolling the grasslands.

rooms.name: Skirting the edge of a tall cliff
rooms.description: The tall cliff that runs north to south between the grasslands and the hilly part of the Hills of Astyll forces you northward.  It appears that the cliff begins to subside to the north and you can turn eastward again.

rooms.name: Around the end of the cliff
rooms.description: The cliff face erodes into a tall hill here.  The ground is rocky, but not so bad that you can't make it around the northern end of the cliff. The Astyll grasslands are towards the south while the Astyll Hills await you to the east.
npcs: An Astyll Scout is here watching over the grasslands.

rooms.name: The north edge of the cliff
rooms.description: You carefully make your way around the north end of a large cliff.  The climb isn't dangerous, but is enough to get your blood pumping.  The Astyll Hills are to the east, and the grasslands are to the west.

rooms.name: It is 4 o'clock am, on the Day of Thunder.
rooms.description: The light intensity here is: 7 Tick Counter:  13505 ticks since the last reboot Tick Timer:       56 seconds until the next tick

rooms.name: The start of the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills are small here.  A large cliff runs towards the south. The north is covered in a vast mixture of hills and forest which makes for rough inaccessible terrain.  The hills extend to the east until become large mountains on the eastern horizon.

rooms.name: Smaller hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills are small here.  To the east they grow larger, until becoming mountains far on the eastern horizon.  To the west you can skirt a tall cliff and enter a vast grasslands.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are surrounded by a myriad mix of landscapes.  The Hills of Astyll extend to the west and south.  The dark green of forest mingles with the barren grey of mountain foothills to the north.  To the east the mountains take hold of the land as it grows steeper.  A small path leads through the foothills to the east.  The meandering paths of the Astyll Hills are to the south and west.

rooms.name: Hacking through the thicket
rooms.description: Driven by a desire you cannot discern, you hack your way into the midst of a dense, overgrown thicket.  It appears to extend many acres, cutting off the land from whence you came for centuries.  Some of the branchs and vine-stalks that harrow your passage through here seem to be younger and weaker.  Perhaps a little bit of determination will find you a way through this mess.
items: A nice, large tree stands ready for you to chop it down.

rooms.name: Deep in the Steep Foothills
rooms.description: You are on a narrow path through the foothills.  On all sides the barren land closes in around you.  Large, dark mountains loom on the eastern horizon.

rooms.name: The Steep Foothills
rooms.description: You are surrounded by steep cliffs and crags to the north and south.  This narrow path continues through the foothills to the east.  The hills of Astyll are towards the west.  To the east and north the steep cliffs and crags continue.

rooms.name: It is 5 o'clock am, on the Day of Thunder.
rooms.description: The light intensity here is: 8 Tick Counter:  13506 ticks since the last reboot Tick Timer:       65 seconds until the next tick

rooms.name: Deeper into the Foothills
rooms.description: The path leads into a canyon to the north.  Dark threatening foothills surround you on all sides now.  The mountains rise steeply to the east. A small path cuts through the foothills to the west.

rooms.name: The Steep Foothills
rooms.description: The land here is desolate and barren, with no gleam of water nor any sound of it.  You are on a track leading north surrounded by steep foothills.  To the east the foothills grow larger until they become misty peaks. More large foothills loom on the horizon to the north.

rooms.name: A Narrow Track heading into the foothills
rooms.description: You are surrounded by steep foothills on all sides.  Large mountains rise to the east.  This narrow track heads north, deeper into the steep foothills. The calmer Astyll Hills are to the west.

rooms.name: The Edge of the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills are bordered by mountains to the east, and steeper hills to the north.  Hills stretch back to the south and west.  The land here is dark and shadowy due to the looming mountains.  A path skirting the steep hills leads to the west.  A narrow track leads farther back into the mountains to the east.  To the south a path meanders parallel to the mountains.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are on a meandering path in the Astyll Hills.  Steep foothills, cliffs, and crags border the path to the north.  The Astyll hills stretch before you to the west and south.  Mountains frame the horizon to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are surrounded by the Astyll Hills on all sides.  A path to the south take you farther in those directions.  A path to the east runs towards the base of an exceptionally large bluff.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are surrounded by the Astyll Hills on all sides.  Paths to the north and south take you farther in those directions.

rooms.name: The Heart of the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are in the heart of the Astyll Hills.  Rolling hills stretch in all directions.  Far to the north and east there are mountains on the horizon. Your view to the northwest is blocked by a large bluff.  Far to the south it appears the Astyll Hills are bordered by forests.  Meandering paths lead to the north and south.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills surround you on all sides.  Plain, golden brown baked hillsides stretch as far as you can see.  There are paths winding their way through the hills to the north, west, and the east.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills surround you on all sides.  To the northwest is a large bluff.  You can follow meandering paths to the west and to the east.

rooms.name: The southwest Corner of the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You have reached the southwest corner of the Astyll Hills.  Directly to the north a large bluff rises before you.  To the west of the bluff are golden yellow grasslands.  To the southwest you can see the top of the city walls of Midgaard.  A path leads up the large bluff to your north and winds back towards the center of the hills to the east.
items: A nice, large tree stands ready for you to chop it down.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are on a path climbing up the tallest bluff in the Astyll Hills region. The west side of the bluff is a sheer face which drops 50 feet straight down into the golden yellow grasslands below.  The hills continue to the east, until they become large mountains.  To the southwest is a large city. To the north you see a great bonfire raging on the plateau at the top of this hill.

rooms.name: The Highest Point in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You stand on the highest point of the Astyll Hills.  From here you can see the landscape in all directions.  The west is covered in golden yellow grasslands.  The east and northeast horizon is framed by mountains.  Southwest of here is a large city and to the southeast is forest.  There is a great bonfire burning here.  You have found the main camp of the raiders that roam these hills.  Paths lead off the plateau to the south and east. To the north large rocks form an enclosed area.
items: A raging bonfire roars out of control in the center of the plateau.

rooms.name: A cave formed by large rocks
rooms.description: You enter a cave like area enclosed on three sides by large rocks.  Rugs and pillows occupy much of this space.  The leader of the raiding groups is sprawled among the pillows.  His guards jump to his defense as you enter the room.  The only exit is back onto the plateau to the south.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are now in the heart of the Astyll Hills.  A cage containing a humanoid skeleton is hanging in a withered old tree.  It appears these hills may not be the safest place in the world.  The paths extending to the east, west, and south all continue through the endless expanse of the Astyll Hills.

rooms.name: In the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You are on a path in the Astyll Hills.  The path delves deeper into the hills to the north.  The hills thin out to the south.  Far to the North and East are high mountain ranges.

rooms.name: Into the Hills
rooms.description: You leave the easy travelling of the Midgaard Roadway and enter the rolling Hills of Astyll.  A path through the hills extends to the north with the Midgaard Roadway to the south.  The hills extend in all directions to the north. Mountains bind the hills to the east.

rooms.name: The Turning Point
rooms.description: The trees stand close here, and the tall, bushy undergrowth prevents you from seeing far in any direction save north, where a broad lane leads off into the distance; and west, where the same lane continues towards what looks like a fairly large city.  The muted sounds of city commotion reach your ears from a distance; stray dogs barking, children crying, and street salesmen shouting.

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills become steeper as you approach the mountains to the east. Rocky peaks and sheer cliffs rise to the east blocking your passage in that direction.  The path takes a turn to the north and follows the edge of the foothills leading into the mountains.

rooms.name: An Intersection in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You stand on the eastern edge of the Astyll Hills.  Mountains rise to your east and north.  The Astyll Hills stretch to the west as far as you can see.  A small gorge extends to the east allowing access into the steep foothills.

rooms.name: A Narrow Gorge in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: You carefully make your way into the narrow gorge.  High cliffs rise to the north and south.  The Astyll Hills ripple off to the west.  To the east a large mountain looms over you.  A small path leads east into dark shadow.  It is rumored that a fearsome dragon lies within the mountain.

rooms.name: The base of the large mountain
rooms.description: Above you looms a tall mountain.  You notice a well used trail leading east up the mountain.  To the left of the trail you see a roughly made sign hanging on a tall pole in the ground.
items: A node full of ore and gemstones juts out from the ground here, ready to be

rooms.name: A Path in the Astyll Hills
rooms.description: The Astyll Hills are steeper here.  Steep mountains rise to the east, and even higher peaks block the horizon to the northeast.  The Astyll hills stretch into the distance to the west and south.

rooms.name: A steep canyon
rooms.description: The path you were following leads down into a steep canyon.  The canyon bottom is strewn with large rocks.  The sides are sheer and extremely high. The canyon continues to the north and a path through the steep foothills is to the south.

rooms.name: In a steep canyon
rooms.description: You are in a steep box canyon.  The canyon continues to the north.  A smaller canyon breaks off to the east.  Back to the south somewhere are the Hills of Astyll.

rooms.name: A small canyon
rooms.description: You are in a small canyon leading eastwards.  The ground rises steeply, and the canyon leads towards a mountain at its eastern end.

rooms.name: Path to Dwarven Village
rooms.description: You climb out of the small canyon onto a narrow path.  Mountains surround you on all sides.  The path continues up the mountain side to the east.

rooms.name: End of the canyon
rooms.description: You are at the end of the canyon.  Large rocks cover the ground.  Steep walls surround you on all sides.  A large crack is one wall, but it doesn't seem wide enough to climb through.

rooms.name: Inside a narrow crack
rooms.description: You have squirmed your way into a narrow crack.  There is just barely enough room for you to return to the canyon.  There is also a very narrow opening in the floor.  It looks as if it drops down onto a slide of sorts. The word DANGER has been etched in large letters on the wall.

rooms.name: Sliding down
rooms.description: *THUMP*   You hit the ground hard after dropping down from above.  You fall on a steep slope and immediately begin sliding downward. ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... Better jump off quick before sliding into the pits of hell!

rooms.name: Off the slide
rooms.description: With a crash you manage to get off the cursed slide.  What a wild ride it was!.  You stand in a small cave.  The cave entrance is in the eastern wall. mishappen, stunted and twisted.

rooms.name: Lost in the Black Forest
rooms.description: You stumble around, lost, and suddenly you find yourself in the middle of the Black Forest!  Towering above you menacingly are evil-looking, misshapen trees, leafless and twisted, with the cold wind howling through their boughs.  All around you, the forest is covered with thick, thorny vines.  All around you, you hear the howling of wolves.  There is a rickety sign posted here.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:Grasslands near the walls of Midgaard|||The grasslands surround you on all sides.  Tall grasses of all kinds are growing.  Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, east, and south.

Shorter grasses with a goldenrod fluff at their tips.  Grasses with green and yellow variegated leaves, and tall stalks of a deep green with a bamboo like appearance.  The grasslands continue to the north, east, and south.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:An entrance to a damp cave|||The floor of the cave entrance appears to be covered in a hard, wet mud that does not cling to your feet.  Using your senses to scan around the area yields a couple interesting observations.  There appears to be footprints or tracks upon the floor, although you could not tell which they are without examining them further.  To the east the cave continues downward, and you can make out the faint smell of bat guano.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:At the top of a deep shaft|||Standing atop a deep shaft in the dark cave, you peer down into the hole and can make out the bottom about twenty feet below you.  Fortunately for you, a ladder has been placed here by some wise adventurer and it appears to be sturdy enough to handle the weight of a half-giant if needed.  Who knows what awaits you down there?  Perhaps you will find a long lost treasure trove, or maybe there will be a horde of goblins waiting to jump out of the shadows and end your adventures right there.  Just west of here you can see the entrance to the cave winding its way out towards the Astyll Hills.
exits.to_room_name: At the top of a deep shaft

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:At the bottom of a deep shaft|||The bottom of the shaft opens up a world hidden from the eyes of all but the most brave of adventurers.  Stalagmites and stalactites meet one another in a crescendo of beauty that many fearful city inhabitants will never get to see. A well trodden path winds its way south through the cave, as though some creature or creatures have inhabited this cave at some point.  Perhaps they still dwell here, or perhaps this path is the last remaining evidence of a people long gone from an age that came and went.  A sturdy wooden ladder reaches down from above you, offering a way out of the cave should you choose to take it.
exits.to_room_name: At the bottom of a deep shaft

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:A path through the cave|||You find yourself on a narrow path through the nearly innumerable number of stalagmites and stalactites that blanket the floor and ceiling of the cave.  An eerie silence, void of the crickets, birds, and various animals from the surface world comforts you by allowing you to hear any potential movement within the cave.  From time to time you hear the fluttering of wings above you, but it is too dark to make out any discernible figures.  The path forks in a three-way intersection.  Directly north of here, a deep shaft can be seen overhead.  The path continues to snake along to the east and west.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:A turn in the cave|||The twisting passage turns slightly here, bobbing and weaving its way through the cave.  The limestone walls are smooth and show evidence of erosion throughout the ages.  Steady, horizontal striations of gradually darkening lines indicate that water once sat for long periods of time in this chamber.  The tunnel opens up to a cavernous chamber further along the path to the west. North of here the path narrows as it twists and winds it way through the cave system.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:An open cavern|||A wide, open cavern splits in three directions here.  Off to the north a cramped tunnel extends onwards towards an unknown destination.  Rocks and boulders are strewn about to the east, clearly an indicator that the ceiling has collapsed and settled safely upon the cave floor.  While moving east does not present any immediate danger from the cave surroundings, off to the west the cavern extends itself and pools of crystal clear water can be seen.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:A spacious cavern|||Fluttering wings can be heard all around you accompanied by the random, yet constant sound of animals chirping in the darkness above.  Crystal clear water gather along the edges of the path, forming a series of underground pools that are teaming with life in this delicate habitat.  Far in the distance to the east, the cavern widens and there appears to be an intersection that provides different ways in which you can travel.  Just to the west of here the cavern walls begin to press in upon themselves as it narrows.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:Standing above a shallow shaft|||The shaft continues downwards, further into the heart of the dark cave system.  Carved by water flowing over the rocky cave structure over time, it is obvious to you that this is the lowest point of the first section of the cave. As such, it makes sense that although the floor is currently bone dry, water should find its way here to slowly drain during the Midgaard rainy season.  An oak ladder leads down into the shaft, though with a good leap you might land safely below.

exits.to_room_key: namedesc:Entrance to the Den|||Bones from various animals and creatures are strewn about the cave floor. Tattered and ragged clothes can be seen everywhere, some mingled with large piles of dung while others lay upon the floor in random places.  Whatever creature has made this den their home is surely carnivorous, and you would hate to find yourself winding up being eaten by it.  An overwhelming odor from the various dropping lingers in the air, a rank and apparent indicator that the creature which has made this their home frequents this place regularly.
